text: turn you, and take your journey, and go to the hill-country of the Amorites, and unto all <FI>the places<Fi> nigh thereunto, in the Arabah, in the hill-country, and in the lowland, and in the South, and by the sea-shore, the land of the Canaanites, and Lebanon, as far as the great river, the river Euphrates.
name: Deuteronomy 1:7
